Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #1 -- 1% S & U - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 1 
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29(A) of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption and the storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property and upon the sale of service, all as defined by law, for an additional period of ten (10) years, from and after January 1, 2014 (an estimated $509,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), with the avails or proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be used exclusively for the purpose of constructing, operating and maintaining Parish public roads, Parish public drainage canals, Parish public bridges and also with ten percent (10%) of the proceeds of said Tax to be used exclusively for insurance premiums of the East Carroll Parish Police Jury?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #2 -- 1.82 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a tax of one and eighty-two hundredths (1.82) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $68,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and supporting facilities and programs for the elderly in the Parish through the East Carroll Council on Aging, said millage to represent a thirty-two hundredths of a mill (.32) increase over the 1.5 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2014 pursuant to an election held on November 2, 2004?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #3 -- 2.53 Mills - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a two and fifty-three hundredths (2.53) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $95,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2019, with the avails and proceeds of the tax to be used exclusively for the utility expense and building upkeep and maintenance of the East Carroll Parish Courthouse Buildings, said millage to represent an eight hundredths of a mill (.08) increase over the 2.45 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2014 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #4 -- 8.22 Mills - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy an eight and twenty-two hundredths (8.22) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $309,230 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2019, with the avails and proceeds of the tax to be used exclusively for the purpose of operating and maintaining the East Carroll Parish Library and Bookmobile, said millage to represent a twenty-five hundredths of a mill (.25) increase over the 7.97 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2014 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #5 -- 2.74 Mills - PJ - 5 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a two and seventy-four hundredths (2.74) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $103,100 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of five (5) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2019, for the purpose of operating, maintaining and supporting the Louisiana Cooperative Extension Program for the Parish, including providing necessary office facilities, equipment and supplies therefor, with no more than three (3) percent of the annual proceeds of the Tax to be retained by the East Carroll Police Jury for its cost of administering the Tax, said millage to represent an eight hundredths of a mill (.08) increase over the 2.66 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2014 pursuant to an election held on April 4, 2009?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW PJ Prop. #6 -- 2.00 Mills - PJ - 3 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Propositions
Proposition No. 6
(Community Actions Agency)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a tax of two (2.00) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $77,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for the entire year), for a period of three (3) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2016, for the purpose of maintaining and operating programs in the Parish through the East Carroll Community Actions Agency?
